channel.title: Commands
channel.description: Hey I know this is a really stupid question, but I need the command for server update, where it says server update, and then second in the bottom left. Someone help please.

item.title: Commands
item.dc:creator: @mrdrzj mrdrzj
item.description:
@mrdrzj wrote:

add this in commands.java: if (playerCommand.startsWith("update") && c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Dan")) { String[] args = playerCommand.split(" "); int a = Integer.parseInt(args[1]); PlayerHandler.updateSeconds = a; PlayerHandler.updateAnnounced = false; PlayerHandler.updateRunning = true; PlayerHandler.updateStartTime = System.currentTimeMillis(); }
and add this in playerhandler

public static boolean updateAnnounced; public static boolean updateRunning; public static int updateSeconds; public static long updateStartTime;

Read full topic
